description:
Two years after the end of the war, http://anidb.net/ch1674 [Sakamoto] put a lot of money into cryptocurrency, but lost it all, which forced him and Mutsu to temporarily disband the http://anidb.net/ch10410 [Kaientai], so they could gather some money and join the Kaientai again. By now, she works at black market, delivering some illegal merchandise, as she did by delivering a powerful weapon to http://anidb.net/ch99125 [Shinpachi] (curiously bought by government officers and delivered to an innocent citizen by them).
Source: Gintama Wiki
name: Mutsu
